Package org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow

Interface NodeOutPortUI

All Superinterfaces:
org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeContainerStateObservable, NodePortUI, org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeStateChangeListener, UI
All Known Subinterfaces:
AsyncNodeOutPortUI, WorkflowOutPortUI
All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeOutPortWrapper, WorkflowOutPortWrapper
public interface NodeOutPortUI extends NodePortUI, org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeStateChangeListener, org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeContainerStateObservable, UI
Interface for a node's output port (mainly for the NodeContainerUI). A variable number of input ports can be connected to it (which are part of the next nodes in the workflow). UI-interface that mirrors the NodeOutPort interface.
Author:
Thomas Gabriel, University of Konstanz, Martin Horn, KNIME.com

  • Method Details

    • getPortObjectSpec

      org.knime.core.node.port.PortObjectSpec getPortObjectSpec()
      Returns the DataTableSpec or null if not available.
      Returns:
      The DataTableSpec for this port.

    • getPortObject

      org.knime.core.node.port.PortObject getPortObject()
      Returns the DataTable for this port, as set by the node this port is output for.
      Returns:
      PortObject the object for this port. Can be null.

    • getPortSummary

      String getPortSummary()
      Get summary of the underlying port object as provided by PortObject.getSummary(). It's a separate method since calling getPortObject().getSummary() may force the underlying table (if it is a table) to restore its content from disc. Summaries are saved in the workflow file (or the node's corresponding sub directory).
      Returns:
      The port object's summary.

    • isInactive

      boolean isInactive()
      Returns:
      true if the contained spec is not null and instance of InactiveBranchPortObjectSpec

    • getNodeState

      org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeContainerState getNodeState()
      Returns:
      the state of the node owning this port.
      Since:
      2.8

    • getFlowObjectStack

      org.knime.core.node.workflow.FlowObjectStack getFlowObjectStack()
      Returns the FlowObjectStack of the underlying node.
      Returns:
      the flow obj stack container

    • openPortView

      void openPortView(String name, Rectangle knimeWindowBounds)
      Opens the port view for this port with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the port view.
      knimeWindowBounds - Bounds of the KNIME window, used to calculate the center which will also be the center of the opened view. If null the center of the primary monitor is used.
      Since:
      2.12

    • notifyNodeStateChangeListener

      void notifyNodeStateChangeListener(org.knime.core.node.workflow.NodeStateEvent e)
      Parameters:
      e - the event which should be forwarded to all regsitered NodeStateChangeListeners
